description.value:
Your existence is an anomaly that defies the normal parameters of your current reality. You might have encountered something that disrupted your core existence, or you crossed the veil from an alternate reality or twisted timeline.

Tradition arcane

Paradox Skill Deception

Paradox Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Stumble]{Stumble}; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Shifting Surge]{Shifting Surge}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Dispel Magic]; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Void Whispers]{Void Whispers}; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Eldritch Wrath]{Eldritch Wrath}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Wall of Stone]; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Slice Reality]{Slice Reality}; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Death Sentence]{Death Sentence}; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Void Vessel]{Void Vessel}; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Call Cosmos]{Call Cosmos}

Warp Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Warp Terrain]{Warp Terrain}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Warp World]{Warp World}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Parallel Forms]{Parallel Forms}

Quantum Field Movements blur as images of alternate iterations of your enemies flicker around them. When an enemy in your quantum field attempts an action with the concentrate trait, the action is disrupted unless they succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5|showDC:all]. The first time a creature fails this check, it becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.
